trans-unit.source: Carry out tasks related to dangerous goods.

seg-source.mrk: Carry out tasks related to dangerous goods.

target.mrk: 危険物に関連するタスクを実行します。

trans-unit.source: Assign active compliance purposes for dangerous goods to products. Compliance purposes (collection of relevant dangerous goods compliance requirements from the issuing authorities) must have already been created in Product Compliance before you can assign them here.

seg-source.mrk: Assign active compliance purposes for dangerous goods to products.
Compliance purposes (collection of relevant dangerous goods compliance requirements from the issuing authorities) must have already been created in Product Compliance before you can assign them here.

target.mrk: 危険物に対して有効なコンプライアンス目的を製品に割り当てます。
コンプライアンス目的 (発行機関からの関連する危険物コンプライアンス要件をまとめたもの) は、ここで割り当てる前に製品コンプライアンスにすでに登録されている必要があります。

trans-unit.source: After you have assigned unpackaged and/or packaged products and a valid dangerous goods purpose and then saved, the product assessments from the relevant compliance requirements are generated if the product has all three of the following logistics roles assigned: emission relevant, transported, and disposed. An assessment for a packaged product is only available after the corresponding assessment for the unpackaged product has been released.

seg-source.mrk: After you have assigned unpackaged and/or packaged products and a valid dangerous goods purpose and then saved, the product assessments from the relevant compliance requirements are generated if the product has all three of the following logistics roles assigned: emission relevant, transported, and disposed.
An assessment for a packaged product is only available after the corresponding assessment for the unpackaged product has been released.

target.mrk: 未梱包製品および梱包製品 (またはいずれか一方)、および有効な危険物の目的を割り当てて保存した後、製品にエミッション関連、輸送済、および廃棄済の 3 つのロジスティクスロールが割り当てられている場合、関連するコンプライアンス要件からの製品評価が生成されます。
梱包製品の評価は、未梱包製品の対応する評価がリリースされた後にのみ利用可能になります。

trans-unit.source: Before a product assessment can be used in transport documents, it must be released by a user with the role of <uicontrol>Dangerous Goods Specialist – Product Compliance</uicontrol> in the <uicontrol>My Unpackaged Dangerous Goods</uicontrol> and the <uicontrol>My Packaged Dangerous Goods</uicontrol> apps. For more information about managing dangerous goods, see <xref keyref="loio06e311304aba4f0aadcb769bae58e690"/>.

seg-source.mrk: Before a product assessment can be used in transport documents, it must be released by a user with the role of <uicontrol>Dangerous Goods Specialist – Product Compliance</uicontrol> in the <uicontrol>My Unpackaged Dangerous Goods</uicontrol> and the <uicontrol>My Packaged Dangerous Goods</uicontrol> apps.
For more information about managing dangerous goods, see <xref keyref="loio06e311304aba4f0aadcb769bae58e690"/>.

target.mrk: 製品評価を輸送伝票で使用できるようにするには、<uicontrol>未梱包危険物</uicontrol>アプリおよび<uicontrol>梱包危険物</uicontrol>アプリで<uicontrol>危険物スペシャリスト - 製品コンプライアンス</uicontrol>ロールを持つユーザが製品評価をリリースする必要があります。
廃棄物管理の詳細については、<xref keyref="loio06e311304aba4f0aadcb769bae58e690"/>を参照してください。
